rules.description: Validates property is present in supplied target array.
Validates property is not present in supplied target array.
Validates property is present within the supplied target range.
Validates property is not present within the supplied target range.

options.name: message
options.description: Error message to be displayed when validation fails.

options.name: messages
options.description: Object holding error message for each rule.

messages.description: Error message returned when exclude validation fails.
Error message returned when exludeRange validation fails.
Error message returned when include validation fails.
Error message returned when includeRange validation fails.
